name: 丹尼尔·J·马丁
name_full: 丹尼尔·J·马丁 Daniel J. Martin
introduction: Daniel Martin, a NYC native is a gregarious, outgoing actor known for playing villains, psychopaths, tough criminals and detectives; and the occasional wild, cynical friend with an easy smile and a wicked tongue.Between his stunt experiences on stage and film, and having over 10 years of Wing Chun Kung-Fu training with hand-to-hand combat and weaponry, Daniel is well suited for this current "era" of Film/TV. A natural jokester, Daniel has always made it a point to make all those around him laugh and have as much fun as possible while first and foremost, putting in the work.
